DOC.HEADLINE: RITA KLIMOVA ; CZECHOSLOVAKIAN AMBASSADOR TO U.S.
DOC.TEXT: Rita Klimova , 61 , a former dissident who became Czechoslovakia ' s first ambassador to the United States after the overthrow of Communism.Klimova taught political economics at Charles University in Prague until her dismissal after the 1968 Soviet-led invasion that crushed Alexander Dubcek ' s liberal reforms . In 1989 , she became spokeswoman for the peaceful " Velvet Revolution " that toppled Communism and brought Vaclav Havel to the presidency . Havel appointed Klimova as ambassador to the United States in 1990 . In Prague on Thursday of leukemia .
